## Problem

What problem does this feature solve? What use case does it enable?

## Proposed Solution

Clear description of the feature you'd like to see.

```bash
# Example command
```

## Constraints

Does this fit our philosophy?
- [ ] Single-command interface (terminates immediately)
- [ ] No backwards compatibility requirements
- [ ] Uses real POSIX tools (SSH, tmux) rather than abstractions
- [ ] Enables autonomous workflows

Any other relevant information, examples, or use cases.
